i5.las2peer.classLoaders

Class BundleClassManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.classLoaders.BundleClassManager

  • public class BundleClassManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A BundleClassLoader is responsible of providing all classes for a main class / service via separate libraries.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BundleClassManager(java.lang.ClassLoader parent)
      create a Bundle

    • Method Summary

      void initLibraryLoaders(LibraryClassLoader[] loaders)
      init library loader with a list Attention: overwrites existing loaders, only for initialization!
      java.lang.Class<?> loadClass(java.lang.String className)
      Load a bundle class from the outside.
      protected java.lang.Class<?> loadClass(java.lang.String className, LibraryClassLoader child)
      Will be called by a child LibraryClassLoader if a class cannot be found there.

        public java.net.URL findResource(java.lang.String resourceName,
                                 LibraryClassLoader calledFromChild)
        Method to actually find a resource. Currently, a class using this class loader may only get resources from its own jar.
        Parameters:
        resourceName -
        calledFromChild -
        Returns:
        an URL

      • loadClass

        public java.lang.Class<?> loadClass(java.lang.String className)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Load a bundle class from the outside. The class will be resolved. Used to load the main service class.
        Parameters:
        className -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • loadClass

        protected java.lang.Class<?> loadClass(java.lang.String className,
                                       LibraryClassLoader child)
                                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Will be called by a child LibraryClassLoader if a class cannot be found there. The parameter for the child library is necessary to prevent loops of loadClass calls.
        Parameters:
        className -
        child -
        Returns:
        the loaded class
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • getLibraryLoaders

        public LibraryClassLoader[] getLibraryLoaders()
        get an array with all registered LibraryLoadres
        Returns:
        an array with all registered library loaders
